name: Maple Classic Worksheet
summary: Learn about .MWS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Maple 9 and later saves worksheets in a new XML-based format with an .MW file extension.

description: Worksheet created with Maple 8.x or earlier, a mathematics and modeling program; may include text, math equations, graphs, charts, and other data; saved in an interactive format that can be opened and edited with Maple.
